original: Cannot usurp the primary title of a Merchant Republic
translation: 无法篡夺商业共和国的主头衔

original: §RIf we become independent now, we will become a lesser republic and the game will end!§!
translation: §R如果我们现在独立，我们将成为一个更弱小的共和国，游戏将会结束！§!

original: Leaders of Holy Orders and Mercenary Companies cannot marry
translation: 骑士团和雇佣兵的领导者不能结婚

original: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! must not be a prisoner of the enemy
